entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
